    • Constructor Detail

      • WaterLog

        public WaterLog(java.lang.Integer windowSize,
        java.lang.Integer maxEntry)
         throws SimulationException
        This WaterLog constructor is used for initializing the log system
        Parameters:
        windowSize - - the (minimum) number of entries(Water Level) that the log must retain
        maxEntry - - the largest value(Water Level) that will ever be entered in the log
        Throws:
        SimulationException - - if windowSize is not strictly positive (i.e., greater than zero) if maxEntry is negative (i.e., less than zero)
